Clearly explain the feature you want to add to the 2048 game. You can also explain the problem that this feature solves (if there is one). E.g. I get annoyed when [...]

Describe how you imagine this feature working. You can explain any alternatives you considered or why you did not choose them.

Also explain the impact on the project and where it will have an impact. 

You can also add any context or examples that may help to understand the request, as well as a screenshot related to the feature request.
